title: Green beauty in 2023 challenges are greenwashing, rising costs and transparency says The Green Chemist Consultancy - CosmeticsDesign-Europe.com
summary: The article discusses sustainability challenges and the importance of addressing greenwashing in the beauty industry, along with the increasing relevance of green beauty certifications and the need for harmonization. It also highlights the significance of transparent supply chains, high raw material costs, and ongoing raw material innovation efforts in the sector.

title: The fragrance of forests - Symrise
summary: The article discusses the optimization of processes related to the extraction of crude sulfate turpentine (CST) at Symrise, focusing on its reuse in fragrance manufacturing and the logistics around transporting the product.

title: Top 10 Best Agricultural Chemicals Companies In USA In 2023 - Inventiva

green_innovation: FALSE - The article focuses on traditional agricultural chemical products and technologies without emphasizing specific environmental sustainability goals or reducing negative environmental externalities.

green_product: FALSE - While the article mentions crop protection products, seeds, and agricultural solutions, it does not emphasize design, production, or usage that significantly reduces environmental impact throughout the product life cycle.
